'''''Vinyar Tengwar 27''''' is the twenty-seventh issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal dedicated to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
{{VTnav|26|28}}

==Contents==
* Cover: "''Valar Empannen Aldaru''" — Patrick H. Wynne
* E.L.F. News

* "ELFcon III Report" — Patrick H. Wynne
* "Trees of Silver and of Gold: A Guide to the Koivienéni Manuscript"✫ — Patrick H. Wynne and Christopher Gilson

<small>✫ contains formerly unpublished material</small>
